<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Corrupted Priest](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2006)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 39</row>

**Perception** +11

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +7, [Gozreh Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +8, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +9, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +9, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +0

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Wild Empathy** The corrupted priest can use [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) and to make very simple [Requests](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) of them.

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), gray robes, [Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45), wooden [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Gozreh](/Deities.aspx?ID=8) defaced with demonic runes

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 45

**Roiling Mind** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The corrupted priest is targeted by an effect with the [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) trait or that requires a Will save; **Effect** The hermit's mind is a storm of chaos due to demonic influences. The creator of the triggering effect takes 3d8 mental damage (DC 20 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
trident +10 ([fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 2d8+1 piercing

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 20, spell attack +12
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Spider Sting](/Spells.aspx?ID=300), [Summon Animal](/Spells.aspx?ID=316)
- **2nd**
[Barkskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=20), [Flaming Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=121), [Summon Elemental](/Spells.aspx?ID=320)

**Demonic Strength**   Corrupted priests deal an extra 1d8 damage with their tridents, and any trident gains the [fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178) trait while the priest is using it (both the extra weapon damage die and the fatal trait have already been included above).

</column>
name: Corrupted Priest
